mapper.select: select a.id, a.open_id, a.date,a.arena_id,a.court_id, a.start, a.end, a.charged, a.fee,a.update_time,a.pay_no,a.pay_type, b.name as court_name from tt_booking a inner join court b on a.court_id = b.id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select a.id, a.open_id, a.date, a.court_id, a.start, a.end, a.fee, a.pay_type, a.pay_no, a.charged, a.update_time, b.nickname, b.wx_nickname, b.avatar, b.vip, d.open_id as share_user_open_id, d.nickname as share_user_nickname, d.wx_nickname as share_user_wx_nickname, d.avatar as share_user_avatar, d.vip as share_user_vip from tt_booking a inner join tt_user b on a.open_id = b.open_id left join booking_share c on a.id = c.booking_id left join tt_user d on c.open_id = d.open_id where a.arena_id = #{arenaId} and a.date >= #{start} and a.date <= #{end} and a.status = 'ok'

select a.id, a.open_id, a.date, a.arena_id,a.court_id, a.start, a.end, a.fee, a.pay_no, a.charged, a.update_time, b.nickname,b.wx_nickname,b.avatar,b.vip, d.open_id as share_user_open_id, d.nickname as share_user_nickname, d.wx_nickname as share_user_wx_nickname, d.avatar as share_user_avatar, d.vip as share_user_vip from tt_booking a inner join tt_user b on a.open_id=b.open_id left join booking_share c on a.id=c.booking_id left join tt_user d on c.open_id=d.open_id
a.date >= #{startDate} and a.date < #{endDate} and arena_id=#{arenaId} and a.charged = false and a.status='ok' and a.pay_type='mc'

select a.date, a.status, a.open_id, a.arena_id, a.court_id, a.start, a.charged, a.end, a.update_time, a.pay_no, b.name as court_name, c.name as arena_name from tt_booking a inner join court b on a.court_id = b.id inner join arena c on a.arena_id = c.id where a.pay_no = #{payNo} order by a.date
